articles.title: Don’t Miss: The Strawberry Supermoon - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Next Full Moon is the Strawberry Supermoon; the Mead, Honey, or Rose Moon; the Flower, Hot, Hoe, or Planting Moon; Vat Purnima; Poson Poya; and the LRO Moon. Many cultures going far back in history have different names for the twelve full moons experience…
articles.content:
ByGordon Johnston, NASAJune 12, 2022

articles.title: 'Time crystals' work around laws of physics to offer new era of quantum computing - Space.com
articles.description: Formed inside superfluid helium-3, the time crystals were observed for a record time of over 15 minutes.
articles.content:
The connecting of two "time crystals" in a superfluid of helium-3 barely one-ten-thousandth of a degree above absolute zero could be a huge step toward a new kind of quantum computer.

articles.title: The Webb Telescope Has Been Hit By Something. Here's What It Means For Science - Forbes
articles.description: Just days before it’s due to see “first light” the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) has been hit by a micrometeoroid, damaging one of the 18 segments in its 6.5-meter mirror.
articles.content:
